



## Experiment 1. 
* baseline model with GMM  
* model covariance 
  * `full-covariacne` -> probably better, but too slow 
  * `tied` is used 
* data : Shoppers cloud recordings 
* parameters
    ``` 
    sampling rate   8000 Hz (fixed)
    FFT point size   400 pt
    FFT len           50 ms
    Window shift      10 ms 
    ```
